name: isolatiN

stmt.origin: mpbir2an(wcel(c0, col), wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c0, cops))
stmt.pretty: mpbir2an(c0 ∈ OL, c0 ∈ Lat, c0 ∈ OP)

body.origin:
|- wcel(c0, col)
-| wcel(c0, clat)
-| wcel(c0, cops)
-| wb(wcel(c0, col), wa(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c0, cops)))
body.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈ OL
⊣ c0 ∈ Lat
⊣ c0 ∈ OP
⊣ (c0 ∈ OL ↔(c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c0 ∈ OP))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, col)
-| wcel(c0, clat)
-| wcel(c0, cops)
-| wb(wcel(c0, col), wa(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c0, cops)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈ OL
⊣ c0 ∈ Lat
⊣ c0 ∈ OP
⊣ (c0 ∈ OL ↔(c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c0 ∈ OP))

body.origin: |- wb(wcel(c0, col), wa(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c0, cops)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, col)
-| wcel(c0, clat)
-| wcel(c0, cops)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈ OL
⊣ c0 ∈ Lat
⊣ c0 ∈ OP

comment: Properties that determine an ortholattice. (Contributed by NM, 18-Sep-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
